website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use ATV cover that can handle heavy storms with no water seepage.
pros: Cover is waterproof under heavy water pressure
Features a quick-release elastic hem cord, universal fit, and UV protection
Durable design protects ATVs in all seasons
cons: Some buyers find it to be thinner than expected

customer_reviews.title: Superb cover.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this cover. It’s held up great through 40+ mph winds and 2 massive golf ball sized hail storms. Just be careful when you remove the cover after being on for a week or two. Yellow Jackets are very industrious little buggers and will build a nest on your machine in no time at all. I’m too old and fat to out run them. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: I installed this cover on a 2019 Suzuki King Quad with a storage box mounted on the rear rack. The cover is very well made - the stitching looks excellent. This cover has an elastic bottom, and the cover extends completely to the ground. Although I do not have a front box mounted, there is no doubt the cover would accommodate it with room to spare. No way the wind would blow this cover off. Figuring out fore / aft was a bit of a pain due to its large size (there is a tiny label sewed to the elastic hem which indicates front) so after installation I used a silver Sharpy to conspicuously mark it Front / rear.
customer_reviews.author: stew

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mess about and buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: There are many different grades of covers for your vehicles. Out of all the ones I’ve purchased for cars and equipment over the years these are pretty great. They have a heavy duty bungee cord sewn in around the exterior of the cover to make it took under it just nicely. Each cover comes with its own storage bag and is easy stored when in use. I was a little worried about the cover fitting over my lifted 420 with snorkels but it more than handled the job. I would recommend this cover to anyone looking to protect their ATV in the off-season or between rides.
customer_reviews.author: Renetti

customer_reviews.title: fits Polaris 800 2up touring
customer_reviews.text: Fits Polaris 2 up Touring 800. Seems to be made of some good material. Time will tell how it will hold up to the Utah snow and sun but overall happy with the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Let's see if it can handle....
customer_reviews.text: Maine winters. Storing a friends polaris 450 @ my cabin for her. Cover is just a bit on the large size, but that will be good for any snow load that sits on it. I think if it was to tight it would rip. On a side note, I did put "hardware cloth" screen over the airbox intake and the intake and exhaust for the belt housing to keep anything from trying to nest inside those.
customer_reviews.author: resq2piper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my lawn mower ones they had for mowers were not large enough. As far as size fou utv i can not say but it is a great product has elastic around bottom so it stays on has a slick finish so it wont scratch or dirt wont stick to it. Light weight and powder dry. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: This ATV cover is so large it covers everything on our Honda ATV all the way to the ground including the tires. The fabric is nice and flexible. We have not yet had any rain to see how waterproof it is, but we are expecting that will be just fine. We are very happy with our purchase of this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: This particular cover is HUGE for a large ATV!
customer_reviews.text: I measured my ATV and bought this LARGE cover feeling sure that it would cover well. It would easily fit an even larger ATV than a Yamaha Kodiak. My only reason for giving only 4 stars is that it has very little definition of "Front" or "Rear" for recovering the ATV after use. I now roll it carefully over the ATV starting at the front and rolling it back to the rear - and reverse that when recovering after use.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Mike

customer_reviews.title: ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cover for my Honda 500 ATV. I read all the reviews on various covers and considered this to be the best choice. I received it a day later, which I thought was pretty fast. It was packed very neatly and seemed to be a very good material, but thin and light. I put the cover on my ATV expecting it to be larger than I needed and it was, but a nice elastic band at the base to keep it snug to the wheels etc. I guess I will see how it holds out thru the winter. So far I think this is a really good buy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this does not cover a polarus 1000
customer_reviews.text: I have to say its construction is very good, its water repelling too is good , but it doesnt cover my side x side it will cover the cab and front end . I have to say its enough for me the woodland camo is good and over all its good enough for me . Id be un happy if it was for my bike but the dump box on my side x side let it rain!
customer_reviews.author: lary grogan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our Polaris and it fit well. It was long enough on the sides to cover the open doorways. So far it has held up well. It is used in the mountains where we have a lot of high winds and it has stayed on securely. The weather is rough on covers there and this one has done the job.
customer_reviews.author: Redsun131

customer_reviews.title: Works well at keeping the weather out.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Large size allows it to easily fit over my atv. Time will tell as far as durability, but the one thing I don't like is how moisture becomes trapped underneath the cover when it's cold. I am sure using a breathable fabric would significantly increase the price so for the money I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: D.Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Covers it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2-up ATV and it's 90 inches long and it's high in the back, but it covers right down to the ground and stays on while driving through town (not exceeding 30 mpg). It has held off a decent rain storm too. I recommend it for those with bigger ATV's.
customer_reviews.author: Time Lord

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Fits my Polaris Sportsman with a front brush guard with room to spare. Fits all the way to the ground and the elastic hugs the tires. Haven’t used any tie downs yet and it’s stayed on during a couple of windy and stormy events.
customer_reviews.author: William LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover. Strong material and water proof. It fits my 2008 Yamaha grizzly 700 with a windshield, big back seat and big tires no problem. It covers every part of the bike all the way to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B

customer_reviews.title: Cover for Polaris Sportsman 500
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great cover. It covers my entire Polaris Sportsman 500. The bike has a seatback and front and rear brush guards. It covers all the way down to the ground and has a snug elastic band around it to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 brute force got a large boxon the back Works perfect close down all the way below the tires
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nasko

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: This product fits true to size. I got it for my 2007 Polaris Sportsman 500 X2, and it fit all the way to the ground around the tires. The elastic around the bottom seems to be pretty good, but I wouldn't try to use this while trailering anywhere. The fabric isn't that thick, and there's no built in straps to go under the ATV to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: GrandePappe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would wait a few months before writing a review. I'm very impressed with this cover!! Covers my wheeler completely and is very water repellent. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William Borchardt

customer_reviews.title: ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover, it covers all the ATV, the quality is good and the price is great. I recommend to others with a Kawaski
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous because it was so cheap, but very happy with it so far. Fits well over Polaris sportsman 500 with rhino back rack, tucks under tires and is waterproof so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Cover is not waterproof as advertised. Disappointed as it was purchased for outdoor use in New England. Thickness of material seems adequete. Fits my Sportsman 500 fine. I would look into other options before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing but good things to say about this cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover for my Honda rancher 420 was worried it would not fit because i had a lounge /seat on the back and a utility box on the front but it covered it with ease and the elastic at the bottom holds great it came a thunder/wind storm the first night and it stayed on to my amazement .All in all great cover great price would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket 69

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these the plain black and the camo. They fit perfectly on my 2020 Polaris 570 sportsman eps.
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Rain resistant
customer_reviews.text: Worked good in rain do not know how long it will last because have had in only few months
customer_reviews.author: robert  kalvinek

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2020 Yamaha Kodiak 700 eps and this cover is a bit too big for it but it works. Decent quality and reasonable shipping time considering the times.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cover and it covers my 95 Polaris sportsman 400 all the way to the ground around all 4 tires. Hasn't been rained on yet but I am impressed with the cover.Appears to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this cover.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this thing is a great cover. More than big enough for bulkier ATV’s. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rose

customer_reviews.title: Xtra large size
customer_reviews.text: Im using it for covering my towed bikes, Xtra large size would cover 3 big electric bikes perfectly
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Big, fits my 2015 can am 500 max, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will have to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for our Polaris 4 wheeler, we would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: D L Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Cover is big enough to cover atv completely Light enough for you to put on easily Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amor

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Use this to cover a large SUV or even my large stroller ! Very nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: dezarae lavrenz

customer_reviews.title: Cover fits well at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cover for our Polaris Sportsman Touring ATV. The cover seems to be well made, fits the quad well and the elastic holds the cover tight against the wheels. We can’t talk about durability yet, a few months in the summer sun will give it a good test. I am happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: SCF

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a couple months on a 2019 Polaris 570. Pretty big on it but the elastic band works great and is tough. The material is good to go too. I keep my bike under a pole shed but wouldn't think twice about leaving it out with this on it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Randoman

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV cover
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Polaris Sportsman 570 perfectly. It is big enough to cover a storage box and still cover the tires. Material is thick but easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Faragasso

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for wheelers with rear seats
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. The fit is awesome for my wheeler with a large plastic seat bolted on the back. I don't know how it will hold up in the sun yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, BIG, easy to use, seems to be strong enough to last
customer_reviews.author: Nolan P. Critchlow

customer_reviews.title: ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit my Sportsman 570 with windshield and back storage box well. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leisten

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's 07 Kawasaki Brute Force 750, fits great (a little big but rather it be that way than a little small). The stretchy part on the bottom is very strong!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good cover and fits nicely over my Polaris X2. Has held up to some light trailering and a few winter storms. We'll see if it handles the whole winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not windproof
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, felt high quality but is NOT windproof. Less than a month and it was ripped and no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Polaris Sportsman 800 and 500. Fit them perfect with ease.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth snell

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to cover my 1984 Honda 3wheeler. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little baggy over my Polaris Sportsman 1000 but would buy this cover again. Elastic wraps under the tires providing total protection for my ATV. Quality appears to be as stated.
customer_reviews.author: K_os70

customer_reviews.title: Covers an 850 Sportsman
customer_reviews.text: Made of a heavy fabric and double sewn seams. Uses elastic banding to wrap around the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cord around the bottom is FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This is far and above the best cover I could have found.
customer_reviews.author: I AM NOT YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE GUY

customer_reviews.title: very lightweight material
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my machine dry and seems to stay in place well but is a bit thin, hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. Stays put in the heavy wind. Awaiting snow this winter for the ultimate test.
customer_reviews.author: Darla A Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Cover for garden tractor
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for a John Deere 318 tractor with grass bag attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quick shipping and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: What did I like? Reasonable price. What did I use this product for? It's an ATV cover. I used it to cover my ATV.
customer_reviews.author: David Belcourt

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and durable material. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and plenty big to cover my husband's four wheeler!
customer_reviews.author: njhunt

customer_reviews.title: awesome cover,
customer_reviews.text: great value, nice big cover. goes right over my 1000 outlander with a trunk box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality was good. I used it on our grizzly 700
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: They fit my polaris 570 quads great with room to spare. great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rollotomasiusa

product_meta.title: PrimeShield ATV Cover - Heavy Duty Waterproof Windproof Large Quad ATC 4 Wheeler Cover, All-Season Outdoor UV Protection for Kawasaki Yamaha Suzuki Honda Polaris ATV, 94 x 48 x 48", Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackPrimeShield Premuim ATV Covers.
If you are looking for a protective cover for your ATV, this one would be a nice choice. The standard size will fit your ATV perfectly. Made of 200D black polyester, this waterproof and heatproof cover is all-weather protective and protects your ATV from natural elements like uv ray, dust and so on. 

Exquisite workmanship
Every ATV cover is subject to strict quality inspection for better firmness. High density stitching ensures extra durability, will not rip, shrink or stretch, designed for long-term storage and mooring.

Warranty Information
We offer One-Year warranty, please be assured. We try our best to offer nice products and service.

Size specification for your reference
A: Fit for 94''Lx48''Wx48""H
feature_bullets: RELIABLE PERFORMANCE: Primeshield ATV Cover uses the high quality 200D OXFORD fabric, which is more weather-resistant, tear-resistant, and wear-resistant. The entire 4 wheeler cover is made of precision two-thread stitching, absolutely enough firm at the seams. Its product life is 2 times and more than most other ATV Covers.

WATERPROOF PERFORMANCE: This quad cover is made of 200D OXFORD fabric with the special textile process. The all-weather ATV cover can withstand up to 1000 Psi water pressure ( Most competitors only 700-800 Psi). In addition, the inner layer of it also adds the waterproof film, all of which completely resolve the problem of water seepage. Your ATV will perfectly keep dry even during a heavy rainstorm.

SECURE QUICK RELEASE SYSTEM: The elastic cord around the bottom hem ensures a tight fit to provide your ATV with 360 degrees of all-around protection, and prevent the ATV cover from being blown away. Moreover, it also comes with anti-ultraviolet, anti-scratch, anti-aging, and other functions, which protect your vehicle against dust, heat, tree sap, damaging UV rays & inclement weather with top to bottom coverage
UNIVERSAL FIT: The XLarge size - 94" L*48" W*48" H ATV cover fit for most ATV, suit for Polaris, RAR, Ranger, Suzuki, Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha ATV and more, fit the most ATVs.

EASY TO USE: Storage bag included, the XL ATV cover can be folded into the bag easily with compact size. If you have any problem or question, simply contact our customer service team. In order to choose the right size cover, please determine the size of your ATV first. All PrimeShield products carry a One-Year warranty, please be assured.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars204 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
